TopicTitle: Game freeze when I enter the training "Construction Basics" twice

Articles.Content:
KSP Version: v1.0.2.842 Windows 32-bit

What Happens: Game freeze when I enter the training "Construction Basics" twice

Mods / Add-Ons: All Stock

Steps to Replicate:

1) enter the training "Construction Basics"

2) follow directions until the last one

3) Press launch icon instead of quit icon

4) enter the training "Construction Basics" again

Result: Game will freeze with no response
Hi jiangtiandao, this is not reproducible on Linux, can you please post your game logs after the freeze occurs.

Hi jiangtiandao, this is not reproducible on Linux, can you please post your game logs after the freeze occurs.
